alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 4:17PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Delaware and northern Sullivan Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 416 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Corbett, or 10 miles southeast of Walton, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rockland, Andes, Hancock, Margaretville, Fleischmanns, Hazel, Harvard, Willowemoc, Arkville and Fishs Eddy. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 87A and 96A. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central New York...and northeastern Pennsylvania.
